                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      • activateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/Activate",
                method=GET)
public String activateUser(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                 @RequestParam(value="user")
                                 Long id,
                                 @RequestParam(value="token")
                                 String token)
        Handler method for account activation.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        id - The ID of the user account to be activated.
        token - The activation token.
        Returns:
        Activation success page if the activation is successful. Activation failure page otherwise.

      • resendActivationToken

        @RequestMapping(value="/ResendToken",
                method=GET)
public String resendActivationToken(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                          @RequestParam(value="user")
                                          Long id)
        Handler method for resending activation tokens.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        id - The ID of the user account whose activation token is coveted.
        Returns:
        Resend token success page if sending the token succeeds. Resend token failure page otherwise.

                method=POST)
public String emailUsername(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                  @RequestParam(value="email")
                                  String email)
        Handler method for username recovery form submission.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        email - The e-mail associated with the coveted username.
        Returns:
        Username recovery success page if the recovery is successful. Username recovery page with the appropriate error otherwise.

      • emailPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/Recover/Password",
                method=POST)
public String emailPassword(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                                  @RequestParam(value="email")
                                  String email,
                                  @RequestParam(value="username")
                                  String username)
        Handler method for password recovery form submission.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        email - The e-mail associated with the coveted password.
        username - The username associated with coveted password.
        Returns:
        Password recovery success page is the recovery is successful. Password recovery page with the appropriate error otherwise.
